com.intel.jndn.management.helpers

Class FetchHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.jndn.management.helpers.FetchHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.named_data.jndn.OnData, net.named_data.jndn.OnTimeout

    public final class FetchHelper
extends Object
implements net.named_data.jndn.OnData, net.named_data.jndn.OnTimeout
    Trival NDN client to fetch one or multiple Data packets.

      • getData

        public static net.named_data.jndn.Data getData(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                               net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest)
                                        throws IOException
        Get a single Data packet.
        Parameters:
        face - Face instance
        interest - Interest to retrieve Data
        Returns:
        Data packet
        Throws:
        IOException - if failed to retrieve packet, e.g., timeout occured

      • getData

        public static net.named_data.jndn.Data getData(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                               net.named_data.jndn.Name name)
                                        throws IOException
        Get data using the exact name (without implicit digest).

        TODO: Allow authentication of retrieved data packets

        Parameters:
        face - Face instance
        name - Exact name of the data packet to retrieve
        Returns:
        retrieved Data packet
        Throws:
        IOException - when communication with NFD fails

      • getSegmentedData

        public static List<net.named_data.jndn.Data> getSegmentedData(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                                              net.named_data.jndn.Name prefix)
                                                       throws IOException
        Get concatenated data from the segmented.

        Note that this method will first send interest with MustBeFresh selector to discover "latest" version of the stream and then retrieve the rest of the stream

        TODO: Allow authentication of retrieved data packets

        Parameters:
        face - Face instance
        prefix - Prefix of the retrieved data. The retrieved data must have version and segment numbers after this prefix
        Returns:
        list of retrieved Data packets
        Throws:
        IOException - when communication with NFD fails
